title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 22 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 22 2021
description:
Clay hosts solo and talks about the great blue migration that he believes will make red states redder.

Journalist David Zweig on the irrationality of mask mandates in school and the disingenuous CDC.

Clay points out how Jesse Waters' words were manipulated by the media, a common tactic of the left.

Coach Dick Vermeil talks about his new movie, American Underdog, the inspirational real-life story of Kurt Warner.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
